ygData.subject: Re: Getting spells as a DE
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found all the spells needed for my character up to lvl 16 so far. You should not have any problems finding spells in Nerriak.  Some of the spells are
ygData.messageBody:
I have found all the spells needed for my character up to lvl 16 so far.
You should not have any problems finding spells in Nerriak. Some of the
spells are located in other guilds or in the Library in 3rd Gate.

Shadair
16th Wizard of the House of J'Axx
Karana

----- Original Message -----
From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 11:26 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Getting spells as a DE


> From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>
> I am a dark elf wizard and if I want to buy any spells that aren't sold in
> neriak what am I supposed to do? I am under the impression that I can't
go
> into any cities without being KOS except for Oggok and Grobb and I don't
> think either of those sells wizard spells. Thanks.
>
